EmailTemplate.name: Response to Become a Member
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for your interest in WeWork!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
We appreciate your interest in WeWork!
Whether searching for a desk in a communal setting or a beautifully designed private office, we can accommodate the needs of you and your team.
We’d love for you to experience the energy of WeWork in person. Visit our WeWork Locations page, choose a city and building you’d like to tour and book it.
https://www.wework.com/locations/?lid={!Lead.Id}&utm_source=NMD&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=NMD_become_a_member
If you'd like to speak with a member of our team, give us a ring at 855-593-9675 - we're more than happy to chat.
All the best,
{!User.Name} {!Lead.Location_Phone_Number__c} wework.com
Create Your Life's Work
